Holy fuck. This series is the pinnacle of NTR. This is everything that is needed within the genre. A sense of the aftermath, a FMC who realises what was actually going on. @bbdo No problems here dude. I turn off my brain when reading a lot of works too lol. Btw, acc to the author, this is his (and their circle's) first take on this kind of genre. Their previous works were about various stuff which were "mostly" wholesome in nature. The common denominator however is that they put a lot of work in the story writing so I find myself liking a lot of their doujins. I feel like regardless of what ending this story will get, I'd still like it as long as they keep up with this quality in story which I have no doubts they will. Sadly, I haven't seen any news on the final chapter so I guess we're gonna have to wait a while.

@Prf.NTR Exactly. The issue with it especially is that my relationship with that side of my family as a whole has soured so there is no way I could ask anything regarding her situation. Had I not known any of it, I probably would be able to just ignore most NTR as something that is not for me, but I am just compelled to read it almost subconsciously in order to find some answers or understanding. Even though I know that I probably won't since it is fiction, and her "reasons" for doing it are just too personal and unique to even understand. Thanks for understanding though, it's hard to talk about this, especially in relation to ntr hentai since it is the closest thing I found to explaining said situation, lol

Oh, so you're like trying to find the answer for the problem that your own family line personally experienced, in a fictional work? Is this right? Well, that is kinda true bc I once had a problem that I can't understand just by basing on my environmental situation. But I found a post on the internet that had almost same problem as mine and yeah I found my answers from that post. Sometimes there's really a thing that can't be explained by reality but can be explained through fictions.
Feel so bad for oksan... Sadge

@GoogleMeBitch  I feel you my guy, totally get it. We have been so jaded by the other types of stories that went along these lines so it's hard at times to look at this in a different light and actually think about other ways these characters could react when have been given usually only one type of reaction by the husbands in situations like these! It's all good brother, don't feel bad about. Like you, I'm just here to read enjoyable or compelling stories and have some good conversation while we are at it!

@DrinksandDame  Definitely agree with you though, this story appears to be head and shoulders above not only cheating works, but doujins as whole that utilizes the sex as a driving force to explore the characters and actions. Again though, that is just my thing, I fap to more vanilla-ish type works, but if I can find some compelling writing while at it, I definitely appreciate it, and when it is ntr, I just try to read to see what it is about and how it could end.

@DrinksandDame How you doing? Thanks again for your summary translations from a while back. And yes, when categorizing the different works some being more for fetishes and just to enjoy with brain turned off while others are more story oriented. The thing with me, personally is that, I turn off my brain for some of the more extreme ones, but when it comes to cheating and ntr, those are a bit more real and occur in reality, so my mind finds it difficult to just turn off and wants to find the reasons as to why these things happen. Again, I read cheating and ntr more so with this mindset and don't even fap to it because it is like I am trying to find answers in those stories, since a family member of mine practically did something similar along those lines and left her boyfriend at the time for some guy that had just gotten out of jail. I know looking for answers in doujins is definitely not the way to go, but it is the only things I have to even potentially explain what happened.

Ngl this is a good story about a female who finally realizes whoring out isn't good in the long run. Almost all NTR/cheating works I just continue with "bitch gets fucked and once she grows old, she gone die alone in a dumpster" to be apathetic towards the work. But this gives a raional look into the mind of the female as she is in the process of cheating. Rational and female mind in the same sentence kek. Can't wait for part 3

@bbdo to be fair, this is a more story oriented doujin than fetish oriented one (not that this exactly stinks of NTR to begin with, but sure let's leave it at that for now since story's not yet done). Doujins in general focuses on the sex because it's a fap material first and foremost. Consequences of the act regardless of the doujin's genre is something that's not always shown since people can wank to it regardless. While your criticism about NTR is a valid one, I think that applies to all genres as well. I mean, a looot of works don't show the consequences of when highshool students love each other and so they fuck and guy shoots his cum inside. But hey, it's just a porn so it's fine. This work is a rare gem, yes. But it's also a rare gem in the entirety of doujins, not just of NTR (or cheating).

Of course there are cucks trying to argue that blatant ntr isn't ntr.

@GoogleMeBitch I would agree with you my guy if this was any other NTR story that just follows the usual formula, but since it looks like we are dealing with actual characters with motives and nuance, I do not think it's just the husband having a cuck fetish, but a husband who is finally realizing his screw ups and wanting to know everything. There is just this need to know what happened in order to come to terms with the current situation a person is facing. If you do not have all the facts, your imagination just ends up wandering to so many different places that not knowing is worse than knowing it all, since if you know all the details, that is where they end, and the person is not left wondering is anything worse happened. However, I am keeping my guard up because this can still end terribly, but with these 2 chapters, I have some hope that the author will give us a decent ending, whatever that may be, but something that makes sense and is grounded.
@haitoku i dont think she will stay with the old guy cause she says he was his "third and LAST partner"

This chapter just did what most if not all NTRs miss and that is the consequences after some of these forced moments and rape, where no regular woman would just drown in pleasure immediately upon being raped, especially after being drugged. She fought with the scumbag, but also with herself, believing that this was punishment for her sins of betraying her husband, thus her giving in to the guy in order to just get out of the situation as soon as possible. This did a good job of dealing with division she is facing in her heart and how she realizes she is just as despicable as the man for her infidelity, thus making her believe that all she is going through is just. Also, finally a woman who actually goes to see the gyno after suffering something so terrible to take preventative action against pregnancy and diseases, meanwhile other stories just depict the woman keeping the child for unknown reasons that make no sense.
